title: Unusual strangely weighted serif
content:
It has been bugging me even though it’s quite an ugly one.  
The A could be borrowed from the greek part of the font, but I’m thinking it’s actually part of the font.

Thanks for any suggestions.

author: Paul-Kenji Cahier

comments.content: I think this is modified Times or Times New Roman.
